titles.title: Providing for consideration of the bill (H.R. 2) to send more dollars to the classroom and for certain other purposes.

action.text: The House Committee on Rules reported an original measure, H. Rept. 106-402, by Ms. Pryce (OH).

Rule provides for consideration of H.R. 2 with 1 hour and 30 minutes of general debate. Previous question shall be considered as ordered without intervening motions except motion to recommit with or without instructions. Makes in order the Committee on Education and the Workforce amendment in the nature of a substitute now printed in the bill as an original bill for the purpose of amendment. Measure will be considered read. Provides that the amendment process shall not exceed six hours. Makes in order only those amendments printed in the Congressional Record. Provides that amendment no. 5 shall not be subj ect to amendment.

calendar.text: Placed on the House Calendar, Calendar No. 136.

action.text: DEBATE - The House proceeded with one hour of debate on H. Res. 336.
The previous question was ordered without objection.

vote.text: On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

bill.summary: 10/19/1999--Introduced. Sets forth the rule (modified open) for the consideration of H.R. 2 (sending more dollars to the classroom).
